reviews.review:
its so awesome!!! 

like meee x3 :p
Genial, mas precisa de um anti-cheat muito melhor.

This game has a lot of potential since its a classic, but sadly its run by greedy valve and gaben who give 0 fucks about this game.
all they care about is profits from fucking useless overpriced skins, cases and keys.
but look away from cheaters and smurfs who dominate and ruin this game.
if you are considering playing this game for free, let me stop you right there.
just dont. all you will get is cheaters and spinbotters against you and there is no point in ever playing this game for free, ever.
you will have to buy the prime version to get any sort of ''normal'' gameplay from this game, however you will still be faced with cheaters in the majority of your matches, and if its not cheaters that you encounter, it will be smurfs.
all in all, if you wanna play this game, try to look for third party mm systems, they are just a little bit less Can**rous, and sometimes you may have fun in 10%-20% of your matches.
Very good but too many cheaters
